name.ch: 跨領域神經科學講座(一)

notice.ch: 教室：中研院跨領域研究大樓B100

department.ch: 跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程
department.en: International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience

remark.ch: 教室：中研院跨領域研究大樓B100

goal.ch: The aim is to provide our first-year students an opportunity to broaden their vision to research areas of nature science and bioengineering that could be potentially incorporated into their neuroscience research.
goal.en: The aim is to provide our first-year students an opportunity to broaden their vision to research areas of nature science and bioengineering that could be potentially incorporated into their neuroscience research.

outline.ch:
Each group will choose 3-4 labs for lecture/visit (like one hour lecture and two hour experiment demonstration).
Each lab/PI will provide a 3-hour lecture/open lab visit to the group of students.
outline.en:
Each group will choose 3-4 labs for lecture/visit (like one hour lecture and two hour experiment demonstration).
Each lab/PI will provide a 3-hour lecture/open lab visit to the group of students.

domain.ch: 基礎認知神經科學理論
domain.en: 基礎認知神經科學理論

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Department:International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
